content: परिवृढ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Firm, thick, dense. {@--2@} Ample, large. --ढः A master, lord, owner, head, chief (used adjectively also); किं भुवः परिवृढा न विवोढुं तत्र तामुपनता विवदंते <ls>N. 5. 42</ls>; <ls>Ku. 12. 58</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6. 25</ls>, <ls n="Mv. 6.">31</ls>, <ls n="Mv. 6.">48.</ls>
